attributes.action: provide the people with a more suitably olympic style logo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the current logo that has been unvieled has been met with massive public outcry. This clearly is not suitable, the BBC have displayed and are displaying public sbumnissions which are vastly more popular than the 'official' logo. We are petitioning that one of these be used.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
